snippet: Stacy McGee was suspended indefinitely for what Coach Bob Stoops called a violation of university policy.
abstract: Oklahoma football coach Bob Stoops suspends defensive tackle Stacy McGee indefinitely for a violation of university policy; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stacy McGee was suspended indefinitely for what Coach Bob Stoops called a violation of university policy.

headline.seo: Oklahoma Suspends Defensive Tackle Stacy McGee
